attributes.additional_details: We oppose the practice of internet child model agencies depicting children in such a way as to present them as objects of sexual desire 'nnchoice' being a notible example. We request that the government bans all such web sites primarily for the protection of the children but also as a closed door to pedophiles. We urge the government to obtain the full cooperation of all countries that currently permit such sites to function in or through their territories.
